en-US.name: AI Chat Premium
en-US.summary: Unlimited conversations with advanced AI models
en-US.description:
Upgrade to AI Chat Premium for unlimited daily conversations and access to more powerful AI language models. Premium subscribers get:

• Unlimited conversations per day
• Access to GPT-4 and other advanced models
• Longer conversation memory
• Priority response times
• No daily usage limits

Perfect for students, professionals, and AI enthusiasts who want unrestricted access to cutting-edge AI conversation capabilities.

customProductPrompts.purchasePrompt: AI Chat Premium gives you unlimited conversations with advanced AI models. Would you like to subscribe for $4.99 per month?
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: You now have AI Chat Premium! Enjoy unlimited conversations with advanced AI models.

testingInstructions:
To test the premium subscription:
1. Ask 'What are premium features?'
2. Say 'I want to upgrade' or 'Buy premium'
3. Follow the purchase flow
4. After purchase, test unlimited usage
5. Verify access to advanced AI models
